content: 2023 Singaporean film ***Sunday*** is a 2023 Singaporean romantic drama film written, filmed and directed by Sean Ng. Centering on two foreign workers who fall in love while working in Singapore, the film stars Filipino actress Rhen Escaño and Vietnamese actor Ho Thanh Trung. The film also features Singaporean actors [Adrian Pang](/wiki/Adrian_Pang) and [Michelle Saram](/wiki/Michelle_Saram) in supporting roles. The film had its world premiere at the [Singapore International Film Festival](/wiki/Singapore_International_Film_Festival) on 6 December 2023. ## Cast - Rhen Escaño as Lily - Ho Thanh Trung as Minh - [Adrian Pang](/wiki/Adrian_Pang) as Mr Lee - [Michelle Saram](/wiki/Michelle_Saram) as Mrs Lee ## Production A lensing ceremony was held on 16 August 2021. The directorial feature debut of Sean Ng, *Sunday* was developed through [TorinoFilmLab](/wiki/TorinoFilmLab) and is supported by the [Singapore Film Commission](/wiki/Singapore_Film_Commission). Former [Raintree Pictures](/wiki/Raintree_Pictures) chief [Daniel Yun](/wiki/Daniel_Yun) serves as associate producer, while Chang Long Jong, Raymond Quek, Melvin Ang, Ng Say Yong and Gary Goh serve as executive producers. Jonathan Choo, son of veteran actor [Zhu Houren](/wiki/Zhu_Houren), serves as a co-writer on the film. This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub.
